ygData.msgSnippet: The Oblitercons/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/Zergling/Oinker/Punch/Ramhorn: Breakdown cursed as a quill barely cut into his armored cannon mode, soon laughing,

From: "Lord Unitron" <KSLawdogg@...>

The Oblitercons/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Scattershot/Zergling/Oinker/Punch/Ramhorn:




Breakdown cursed as a quill barely cut into his armored cannon mode, 
soon laughing, firing off another shell at Spears.

---

Hiss yelled, a spear slicing open his left side.  He fell to a knee, 
firing off another rocket at a cannon that was moving to open fire on 
the Oblitercons.

---

Dark One activated his targeting sytems.  Gettinga lock, he fired off 
two missiles at an autocannon, laughing as the meager defenses opened 
fire on him, digging into his light armor.

---

A compartment in the front of Pyro slipped open, as did another one 
only a few feet next to it.  He fired off two missiles, one at a 
different cannon.

---

Scavenger opened fire, twenty-five shells steaking out at Rodimus 
Prime.

======

"Emperor Nemesis Enforcer, the troops are assembled.  There are three 
of them."

"Excellent, Scattershot.  Tell them to attack, full speed ahead!"

"Yes...sir...psycho." Scattershot said the last word in a whisper, 
activating the intercom for the outside of the ship.
"GO ATTACK THE ARK!  TAKE NO PRISONERS!  PILLAGE AND PLUNDER! KILL 
WOMEN AND CHILDREN FIRST!" Scattershot laughed evilly, Nemesis 
Enforcer joining in.


---

Oinker transformed into his tractor mode, Punch and Zergling hopping 
on, the redneck robot going full speed for the not that far away 
<EM>Ark</EM>.

===

Ramhorn took out his sub-machine, griping about ANOTHER attack, and 
how he knew he was going to get tooken hostage again, and some idiot 
like that Hot Rod wanna be was going to open fire on the people 
holding him hostage, even after ordered him not too.

But wasn't that the fun part?  He transformed to beast mode, charging 
for the nearest way out.
